cves.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Aryom Software High Technology Systems Inc. KVKNET allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects KVKNET: before 2.1.8.

affected.vendor: Aryom Software High Technology Systems Inc.

problemType: CWE-79 Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting')

cves.description: HTML injection vulnerability found in Fairsketch's RISE CRM Framework v3.8.1, which consist of an HTML code injection due to lack of proper validation of user inputs by sending a POST request in parameter 'title' in'/projects/save'.
problemType: CWE-79 Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting')
